description:
Katalyse (previously known as FundYourselfNow(FYN) & child company of Pinnacle One Consultancy Pvt. Ltd) aims to be the Kickstarter version 2.0, where Project creators can either list or launch their ICO on our website and raise funding. We offer help to people who want to raise funds for projects that they are passionate about. On the other hand, we provide Backers with top quality ICO projects to participate in.
Create and Launch your ICO

Yes, you heard it right. Katalyse allows you to create and launch your ICO within minutes. This is to ensure that project owners get a right platform to launch their ICO. Just input project information, fundraising and token information and deploy your Smart contract to create and launch your ICO.

PR & Content Marketing Service
Katalyse helps projects with PR & Content Marketing. This is to reach out to the broader crypto community and find supporters & investors for your company. We’ll write, edit and distribute marketing articles through Top crypto media channels. Weekly Reports on Readership will be provided.

Free ICO Listing Service
Katalyse offers free ICO listing services to all the Project owners. Signup, give information like project details, token and token sale details, and list your ICO in front of 12000+ backers for FREE.

Premium ICO Service Package
Katalyse offers comprehensive ICO service package to our client, which covers every aspect you need during the ICO process. We’ll help review your white paper & token model, providing access to lawyers and compliance specialists, building up all the marketing channels and introducing you to cryptocurrency exchanges(e.g CoinChangeX).
name: Katalyse
